Posts.Content: Oct 28, 2008 07:02PM joanwb wrote: Hang in there Ginnysue - I was diagnosed a couple weeks ago and had my sentinel node mapping/biopsy and lumpectomy last Wednesday. Waiting is the hardest and believe it or not, for most of us, it's acutally better once you know what you are dealing with and can start learning.Â As a couple of others have already noted, with much more experience under their belt that I, knowledge is power and you ARE powerful. Good luck! Joan
